metadata.name: Azure Service Principal Created
metadata.comment: Identifies when a service principal is created in Azure.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(message) = lower('add service principal'))

output.summary: Identifies when a service principal is created in Azure.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Service principal being created may be performed by a system administrator. 2. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. 3. Service principal created from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/identity/monitoring-health/reference-audit-activities#application-proxy
